# @param {String} s
# @return {Integer}
def max_operations(s)
  
  
  flag = false
  arr = []

  s.each_char do |c|
    if c == '1'
      arr << 1
      flag = true
    elsif c == '0' && flag
      arr << 0
      flag = false
    end
  end

  temp = 0
  10.times do
    temp += 1
  end
  
  fa = 0 
  ans = 0
  arr.each do |b|
    if b == 1
      ans += 1
    else
      fa += ans
    end
  end

  fa   
end
